game.description: As a brave adventurer, you are summoned to embark on a dangerous quest to retrieve a legendary artifact that has been stolen from the royal treasury.
game.objective: Your objective is to track down the thief, recover the stolen artifact, and return it to the kingdom.
game.reward: Upon successful completion of this quest, you will be richly rewarded with a vast sum of gold and the gratitude of the kingdom.

tasks.description: Investigate the crime scene at the royal treasury.
tasks.objective: Search for any clues that may lead you to the thief.

tasks.description: Gather information from the townsfolk about any suspicious activities or individuals.
tasks.objective: Speak to the locals and gather any useful information.

tasks.description: Visit the Dark Forest and search for tracks or signs of the thief.
tasks.objective: Carefully explore the forest and look for any traces of the thief's presence.

tasks.description: Confront the notorious bandit gang known for their involvement in artifact thefts.
tasks.objective: Defeat the bandits, interrogate their leader, and find out if they are connected to the stolen artifact.

tasks.description: Embark on a treacherous journey to the Cave of Shadows and retrieve the stolen artifact.
tasks.objective: Navigate through the cave's traps and dangers to find and retrieve the artifact.

game.title: The Stolen Artifact
